mapper.select: select c.guid as domainId,c.name as domainName,c.tenantid as tenantId,t.name as tenantName from category c left join tenant t on c.tenantid=t.id where c.level=1 and c.categorytype=1 order by c.tenantid,c.createtime desc
select count(*) from category where parentcategoryguid=#{guid}
select guid as themeId, name as themeName from category where parentcategoryguid=#{guid} order by createtime desc
